results.title: Juvenile acanthosis nigricans and insulin resistance.
results.text_hl: Dietary control and oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin hydrochloride@@@ markedly improved the lesions.
